extendedInfo.description: Having trouble focusing? Pomodoro Tracker will massively improve your productivity by dividing your work into manageable blocks of time (called "pomodoros"), with frequent short breaks. But this is much more than the average timeboxing app:* Set goals for each weekday, and you'll have a progress bar for how close you are to reaching your goals for the day and the week. This is an incredible motivator!* Every pomodoro you complete is stored in a database, which you can use to track your progress.* Chart your progress over time! (Pro Version, an in-app purchase)* Create categories of activities, such as "Programming", "Gardening" and "Studying", then track and chart them separately. (Pro Version)* Pause a pomodoro in the middle - never drive yourself crazy waiting that last ten minutes to take an emergency bathroom break!* Adjust the time of the current pomodoro by tapping the timer text - perfect for adding time if you get sidetracked, or subtracting time if you did work off the clock.* While working, the icon in the action bar shows the number of minutes left, so you can see without unlocking your phone or leaving another app.* After completing a pomodoro, you'll see a timer - in case you spaced out and didn't notice the alert sound, you'll know how much longer you were working.* Configurable work and break lengths, as well as a long break interval.These are just a few of the features that make Pomodoro Tracker stand out from the crowd. Give it a try - you'll be amazed how much more productive you'll be, and how refreshed you'll be from the frequent short breaks!--------------------------------------------------------------Pro Version:This is a $6.99 in-app purchase, available from the "Upgrade to Pro" menu item. The pro version unlocks the pomodoro history graphs, activity tracking, removes the ads, and will most likely offer more features in the future.Coming soon: task tracking!--------------------------------------------------------------Permissions:BILLING - Enables the pro version upgrade.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, INTERNET - Used for ads in the free version.DISABLE_KEYGUARD, WAKE_LOCK - If enabled, allows your phone to wake up when pomodoro is finished.VIBRATE - Self-explanatory.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - We try to write the history database to the SD card to make it easier for you to access and back it up.

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: It does what it says it does. Very simple to use, yet a really effective studying motivator! I keep trying to beat my pomodora scores of previous days. I hope the developers will keep updating it, especially the tasks and subtasks feature! Great job!
reviews.author: Mussa Hamad

reviews.title: Awesome but lacking in one aspect
reviews.comment: Please make the app take breaks after pomodoro  successions. It\'s annoying stopping at 3,having configured at 4 and when I return hours later, it wants me to take a break.
reviews.author: Marvin Moreno

reviews.title: Love the ability to customize pomodoro length!
reviews.comment: Best pomodoro app I\'ve used.
reviews.author: Dan Meeker

reviews.title: Best one I\'ve used so far
reviews.comment: The feature set is almost perfect and implementation is awesome. I\'ve used two others (bought and paid for) and neither is as well thought out as this one. If you enjoy an intuitive promodoro app with useful analytics and goal settings this is it. The only thing it lacks is a task list but that\'s kind of secondary to me. I prefer the category tracking more.  Update. Not sure why it\'s said I gave one star. I meant to give it 4
reviews.author: Conrad Morris

reviews.title: Needs some easy fixes
reviews.comment: I purchased the pro version of this app because goal and activity features are worth the money. That\'s great to be able to put daily goals of number pomodoros, and to see how much you achieve. It\'s also wonderful to classify the pomodoros based on the activity type. However I cannot use the app because of some simple limitations: 1) It makes a ticking noise in first 5-10 seconds of each pomodoro and there\'s no way to deactivate it, it ticks even at the silent mode! I share an office with colloquies and it\'s embarrassing when I forget to turn down the volume. I cannot use it during meetings for the same reason. 2) Many times I forget to turn the app on, or study/write when I don\'t have my phone with me. I\'d like to record those times later but there is no way to enter number of pomodoros later. It would be great if developers put an option to enter pomodoros for a particular day later so the statistics and goal settings would be meaningful. If these two items are fixed, I\'ll happily update my rating and my comments.
reviews.author: Derya Demirta\305\237

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Would be better if there was a widget for it. Otherwise great!
reviews.author: L Lawliet

reviews.title: So close
reviews.comment: The pro version is so close to bring what I want. The addition of a task list would make it worth giving up on a paper notepad entirely.
reviews.author: Duncan Walker

reviews.comment: too expensive
reviews.author: Paul Teale

reviews.comment: free version has very limited feature
reviews.author: Leo Liang

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: Can\'t figure out what to do
reviews.author: Firshy Hlm

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: The best time management software so far. Helps focusing and measuring productivity time. Bought the pro version.
reviews.author: Tam\303\241s K\303\266r\303\266zsi

reviews.title: Great, but needs a few touches
reviews.comment: There are a few things that would make this perfect and worth what I paid. If you\'re on a break and you accidentally close the app from the recent apps screen, the app thinks the break is a pomodoro. This needs to be fixed. Second, a 4x1 widget would be great. I could put it on the lock screen to avoid unlocking the phone. If that\'s too hard, the ability to keep the screen on (but dimmed) while the timer is active would help.
reviews.author: Kishan Gupta

reviews.title: Best pomodoro app
reviews.comment: Best one I\'ve come across so  far, bought the pro version for the extra features as well as to support the developer! Hopefully the task tracking for activities comes out soon, also it would be cool if you could write notes down for tasks, for example at the end of the day I like to write down how I could have improved on a particular task. As I\'m currently doing that on paper, if something like that could be integrated into the app that would be great.
reviews.author: Azair Sheikh

reviews.title: Great little timer
reviews.comment: This is a great pomodoro timer, and the notifications and unlocking of the phone at the pomodoro expiration are very nice touches. The developers seem to be actively improving it as well, which is a good thing.
reviews.author: Einar Lielmanis

reviews.title: Great designed timer but...
reviews.comment: I like very much the design of the app but it didn\'t say the purchase had to be done to have access to the stats. And when i went to buy the app it redirected me to an instant payment not the pro version of the app (if that exists) and whre the amount of the payment was not defined clearly so i didnt press continue...
reviews.author: Efthimios Petrakis

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love it so far. Loving the goals option. Really keeps me from quitting early.  Suggestion. I love the goals idea. If you\'re able to track Pomodoros for separate goals and have a history tracker for them, I\'d definitely pay for the pro version  Edit: activity tracking is now included!? Amazeballs. Time to upgrade. Thanks!
reviews.author: john mendez

reviews.title: The best Pomodoro out of the 5 I tried, but power drain
reviews.comment: Although not as popular, this is the best one. Clean interface. My favorite features are: minutes remaining age displayed in the notifications bar, customizable buzzer noise, and able to keep track of process. Unfortunately, it\'s a battery hog :(
reviews.author: Bryce Johnson

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Near perfect feature set. Would be great to have a vibrate only feature for the ringtone. Also, could be clearer that the ticking at the first few seconds of a new pomodoro will fade. I have come to really appreciate this feature, but I thought the ticking setting wasn\'t being recognized at first.
reviews.author: Frank Chang

reviews.title: My favorite pomodoro timer
reviews.comment: Clean, nice-looking interface. I decided to the pro version to get rid of the ads, and it looks even better now. The daily/weekly goals feature is great. The ability to pause a pomodoro is also a nice touch. Just the set of features I was looking for.
reviews.author: Gavin Ferguson

reviews.title: Don\'t buy Pro, license randomly disappears
reviews.comment: Previously bought pro on a different Google Account on the same phone, but after reinstall I can\'t even open the dialog to \"upgrade.\" Waste of money that the developer needs to fix.
reviews.author: Jonathan Chan
